body:
It looks like the only CI failures here are some lint problems in Circle, so we can probably merge this if it passes review.

If you get to the point where you need to wipe mozilla-central again, I'd like to have a vidyo call with you to see if we can work through the issue using less extreme methods. Maybe there is something easy we can figure out that won't require a full rebuild.

body_html:
It looks like the only CI failures here are some lint problems in Circle, so we can probably merge this if it passes review.

If you get to the point where you need to wipe mozilla-central again, I'd like to have a vidyo call with you to see if we can work through the issue using less extreme methods. Maybe there is something easy we can figure out that won't require a full rebuild.
